Texts.Chs: 第一层机械加工工作台是生产机械零件的地方，并将作为基础工作站，为您的许多科学探索。你已经学会了自己创建一个，还有各种基本项目在工程中使用。要制作一个机械加工表，你需要使用你的基本[ c ]漂流菜单。
第一层你现在可以在机加工桌上创建各种音乐盒，也可以在修补桌上创建便携音乐盒。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 1^reset;

You can now create a variety of music boxes at your Machining Table as well as a portable one at the Tinkering Table.

Texts.Chs: 第一阶段你正在学习工程学不仅仅是创造新的东西，而是在你已经创造的东西基础上进行改进。为了达到这个目的，你已经学会了创建一个修补表，它将允许你制作 EPP 模块，基本的动力设备，奇异的武器升级，和有用的工具，如一个 Hookshot 或矿业激光。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 1^reset;

You're learning that engineering isn't just about making new things, but improving on the ones you already made. To this end, you've learned to create a ^orange;Tinkering Table^reset; which will allow you to make EPP modules, basic powered devices, bizarre weapon upgrades, and useful tools such as a Hookshot or Mining Laser.

Texts.Chs: 您已经开发了许多有用的工具。它们的功能可以通过使用操作器模块升级来改进。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 1^reset;

You've developed a number of useful tools. Their functionality can be improved by upgrading them with manipulator modules.

Texts.Chs: 您已经获得了制造各种更有用的挖掘工具的能力。特别值得注意的是采矿激光，它可以升级与机械手模块和使用您的能源而不是耐用性。有了足够多的升级，他们升级得相当快，而且是值得的投资。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 1^reset;

You've gained the ability to make a variety of more useful mining tools. Of particular note is the Mining Laser, which can be upgraded with Manipulator Modules and uses your energy instead of durability. With enough upgrades, they get quite fast, and are a worthy investment.

Texts.Chs: 你已经学会了资源提取的基础知识，现在可以建立基本的设备来提取、研究和离心材料。提取器把几乎任何东西放进去，它就会把它转换成其他东西。大多数项目是以50人为一组处理的。离心机把任何液体放进去，离心机就会开始工作——尽管木制的那个不太耐用，不能处理熔岩和其他易挥发的东西。电力系统树的研究。研究计算机将一个值大于0的项目放在一个中，它会自动将其转换为相当于该项目像素值1% 的研究量。通过研究金线路学到的。
第一层你已经学会了制作自己的身体增强技术，并且可以在你的个人三录仪上创建一些基本的技术。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 1^reset;

You've learned to make your own body-enhancing Techs and can create a few basic ones at your ^orange;Personal Tricorder^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 你的宇宙飞船可能已经坏了，但这并不意味着你不能修理它。使用旧的废弃超光速驱动器的部件和核心碎片的热能，你现在能够制造一个基本的船舶发动机(STL 发动机，在机械加工桌上创建)。虽然适合星内旅行，STL 引擎不够强大，不足以离开你的系统-你需要研究适当的超光速技术来做到这一点。如果燃料被证明是一个问题为您的飞船找到: 前往月球或产生一些氢处理水(通过提取或离心机)。此外，你可以制作一个非常简单的机械 EVA 或行星的使用(创建在机械零件手工制作桌。你可以以后再研究一个，或者使用前哨基地的那个)。机甲将提供大量的伤害抵抗力，帮助你在恶劣的环境中活得更久，并且能够在大气层和太空中飞行。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 1^reset;

Your spaceship may have broken down, but that doesn't mean you can't fix it. Using parts from your old junked FTL drive and the thermal power of Core Fragments, you are now able to make a basic ship engine (^cyan;STL Engine^reset;, created at a ^orange;Machining Table^reset;).

While fine for intrastellar travel, the STL engine isn't nearly powerful enough to leave your system - you'll need to ^orange;Research^reset; proper FTL technology to do that.

If ^cyan;Fuel^reset; is proving an issue to find for your ship: head to a ^green;Moon^reset; or produce some ^cyan;Hydrogen^reset; by processing water (via ^orange;Extraction^reset; or ^orange;Centrifuge^reset;).

 Additionally, you can craft a very simple mech for EVA or planetary usage (created at a ^orange;Mech Part Crafting Table^reset;. You can ^green;Research^reset; one later, or use the one at the ^orange;Outpost^reset;).

Mechs will provide a large amount of damage resistance and help you stay alive for longer in harsh situations, and are able to ^green;Fly^reset; in an atmosphere as well as space.

Texts.Chs: Tier 2 Gold 在计算机领域有许多有用的应用。现在，您可以将其用于创建有用的处理器和 RAM 棒。请务必升级您的加工表成为自动装配第一！
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

Gold has many useful applications in computing. You can now put it to use in the creation of useful processors and RAM sticks. Make sure to upgrade your Machining Table into an ^orange;Auto Assembler^reset; first!

Texts.Chs: 萃取实验室比手工粉碎机进步了一大步，工作速度更快。你需要许多萃取实验室来处理各种各样的资源。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

The extraction lab is a big step up over the hand mill, working much more quickly. You'll want many extraction labs to process all sorts of resources.

Texts.Chs: Erchius 水晶背后的科学仍然非常模糊，但有一件事是确定的: 这些水晶掌握着超光速旅行的关键。有了制造你自己的超光速驱动器的能力，整个星系现在都可以进行探索了。当 Erchius 为基础的驱动器仍处于初级阶段时，只有 Erchius 燃料可以为 FTL 旅行提供动力。然而，人们已经发现了如何使用放射性同位素或生物燃料等多种来源来驱动汽车。
第二层石墨烯这种奇妙的材料的导电性远远好于它的碳原子。有了它，你就可以制造出非常耐用、耐热的电路，这些电路将在重型机械中派上用场。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

The wonderful material known as Graphene conducts electricity far better than its carbon origins might indicate. With it, you can create very durable, heat resistant circuits that will be useful in heavy machinery.

Texts.Chs: 根据你的工程学知识，你已经设计了一些基本的可拆卸机器人奴才来帮助你。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

With your engineering knowledge, you have designed a few basic depolyable robot minions to help you out.

Texts.Chs: 第2层你可以制作改进的技术，提供更好的效用和功能。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You can make improved Techs that provide greater utility and function.

Texts.Chs: 第二层你现在可以在你的加工桌上创建各种有用的对象，尽管你可能必须首先升级它才能做到这一点。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You can now create a variety of helpful objects at your Machining Table, though you may have to upgrade it first to do so.

Texts.Chs: 第二层: 你可以接触到大量的装饰性船舶物品。他们什么也不做，但也许他们会让你的船看起来更酷？
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You gain access to a large number of decorative ship objects. They don't do anything, but maybe they'll make your ship look cooler?

Texts.Chs: 你已经设计了一个船舶工艺表来生产更先进的船舶部件。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You've designed a Ship Crafting Table to produce more advanced ship components.

Texts.Chs: 第2层您已经开发了一套简单的 EPP 模块，可以安装这些模块以获得有用的好处，除了您的 EPP 已经提供的效果之外。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You've developed a suite of simple EPP modules which can be installed to gain useful benefits in addition to the effects your EPP already provides.

Texts.Chs: 你已经学到了很多关于建造模块化机甲的知识，现在你可以在机甲手工桌上制造银河系标准的机甲部件了。机甲的重量很重要。重型机甲更容易四处走动，燃烧的燃料也更少，而重型机甲则更耐用，可以跳到它们身上压碎东西。
第二层你已经把你对计算机部件的知识用于生产便携的笔记本电脑，这些电脑将自动为你生成研究。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You've put your knowledge of computer parts to use to produce handy laptops that will automatically generate research for you.

Texts.Chs: 第三层访问量子计算意味着你可以制造更强大的计算机，更快地研究和存储更多的数据。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

Access to quantum computing means you can make stronger computers that research more quickly and store more data.

Texts.Chs: 它们可能不会永远持续下去，但是它们肯定会很快地完成我的工作。您可以访问一些更易于使用的挖掘工具。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

They may not last forever, but they sure do mine fast. You gain access to a few more consumable mining tools.

Texts.Chs: 第三层研究结果表明，制造很酷的交通工具与制造宇宙飞船并没有太大的区别。你可以制造潜艇和垂直起降飞行器，既可以在太空中也可以在大气中运行。让他们在你的自动汇编器/物质汇编。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

Turns out making cool vehicles isn't too different from working with spaceships. You can make submarines and VTOL craft that can operate both in space and in atmosphere. Make them at your Auto Assembler/Matter Assembler.

Texts.Chs: 使用你的微型工程知识，你现在可以在你的自动装配机上制造你自己的升级模块，机械手模块和技术卡。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

Using your knowledge of microengineering, you can now fabricate your own upgrade modules, manipulator modules and tech cards at your Auto Assembler.

Texts.Chs: 第三层随着对计算机技术和物理学的深入理解，你现在可以创建力场来保护你的基地免受任何伤害。非常有用！
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

With a solid understand of computer technology and physics you can now create Force Fields that ^green;protect your base from any harm^reset;. Quite useful!

Texts.Chs: 第3层随着技能的增加，制造更先进的机械身体的能力增强，这些机械身体可以抵抗伤害，储存更多燃料，并且更容易在危险环境中生存。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

With increased crafting skill comes the ability to make more advanced mech bodies that resist damage and store more fuel and survive in dangerous atmospheres more easily.

Texts.Chs: 你现在可以为你的机甲制造更好的模块，这些模块可以提供更好的属性或增加效用。你也可以制作机械零件用的接口芯片。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You can now craft better modules for your mech which grant better stats or increased utility. You can also craft Interface Chips for use in mech parts.

Texts.Chs: 您已经设计了许多新的 EPP 模块，它们将保护您免受热、辐射、寒冷和其他危险。在充满敌意的环境中生存从来没有这么容易过。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've designed a lot of new EPP modules which will protect you from heat, radiation, cold and other hazards. Surviving hostile environments has never been so easy.

Texts.Chs: 你已经设计了三个强大的能量核，每个都有自己的科学和军事应用的清单。熔融的核心是优秀的时候处理强烈的热量，如在鼓风炉或熔岩喷射火焰喷射器。动力核心闪耀在动力学应用，是有用的机器与许多运动部件和高端弹道武器。核芯可以用来引导辐射，比如在裂变反应堆中，或者只是为高需求的发明制造大量的能量。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've designed a trio of powerful energy cores, each with their own laundry list of scientific and military applications. Molten Cores are excellent when dealing with intense heat such as in blast furnaces or lava-spewing flamethrowers. Power Cores shine in kinetic applications, and are useful in machines with many moving parts and high-end ballistic weapo nry. Nuclear Cores are useful for channeling radiation, such as in a fission reactor, or just plain making tons of energy for high-demand inventions.

Texts.Chs: 第三层你在萃取实验室的设计上有了很大的改进，生产出了一个处理资源比以往任何时候都快的实验室。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've greatly improved upon your extraction lab design, producing a lab that is faster than ever at processing resources.

Texts.Chs: 你已经改进了机甲的运动系统，现在可以制造更快的腿和助推器。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've improved on the movement systems of your mech and can now craft faster legs and boosters.

Texts.Chs: 第三层你已经改进了你的超光速设计，允许创造更大，更强大的引擎和进一步净化和加强你的飞船的燃料的方法。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've improved on your FTL design, allowing for the creation of bigger, more powerful engines and a way to further purify and enhance your ship's fuel.

Texts.Chs: 第3层您已经改进了 EPP 模块的设计，为许多模块开发升级，并发明了一些新的模块。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've improved upon your EPP module design, developing upgrades for many of your modules and inventing a few new ones, too.

Texts.Chs: 你已经学会了为你的机甲制造更强大的武器。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've learned to make some stronger weaponry for your mechs.

Texts.Chs: 第三层你已经学会了在原子炉里制造空间效率高的电池，这些电池可以用作机械和一些武器的剩余动力源。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've learned to make space-efficient batteries at an ^orange;Atomic Furnace^reset; which will be useful as surplus power sources in machinery and some weapons.

Texts.Chs: 第三层你已经把原始能量的疯狂的能量转移特性，工作在高度复杂的处理器与量子位-不再只是1或0，但有时两者！量子处理器在高端电子产品中有许多用途。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've put the insane energy-transferring properties of Protocite to work in highly complex processors which work with quantum bits - no longer just 1 or 0, but sometimes both! Quantum Procesors have many uses in higher-end electronics.

Texts.Chs: 你的实验已经创造了一些很酷的新玩具。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

Your experimentation has led to the creation of a few cool new toys.

Texts.Chs: 第三层: 你的机器人知识正在增长，它在你手边的新设计中显示出来。你现在可以使用更强大的机器人了。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

Your robotic knowledge is growing, and it shows in your handy new designs. You now have access to stronger robots.

Texts.Chs: 通过将量子计算和特殊的晶体结合起来，你可以创造出能量聚焦装置，这种装置在高科技机器和强大的能量武器中都非常出色。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

By combining quantum computing with specialized crystals, you can create energy-focusing devices that are excellent in high-tech machines as well as powerful energy weapons.

Texts.Chs: 仅仅跑快是不够的，你必须跑得非常非常快。通过新改进的设计，你离这个目标又近了一步。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

It's not enough to just go fast - you've got to go really, really fast. You're one step closer to that goal with your newly improved designs.

Texts.Chs: 你不再需要付钱给专业人士——你就是那样的专业人士！你可以自己制作各种个人传送器。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

No longer do you need to pay a professional - you ^green;are^reset; that professional! You can make a variety of personal teleporters on your own.

Texts.Chs: 宇宙可能是一个危险的地方，但是如果你有一把真正的大枪的话就不会。你可以制造更好的机甲武器。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

The universe can be a dangerous place, but not if you've got a really big gun. You can make even better mech weapons.

Texts.Chs: 第四层: 使用人工智能技术，你设计了一个数据塔，它将为你的利益产生大量的研究成果，远远超过之前所有的计算机。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

With AI technology, you've designed a data tower which will generate huge amounts of research for your benefit, vastly outstripping all computers that came before it.

Texts.Chs: 你可以制造更好的机械模块和纳米插座，它们是高级机械的关键部件。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

You are able to craft even better mech modules as well as Nano Receptacles, which are key components in advanced mechs.

Texts.Chs: 第4层你可以制作显著改进的技术，提供更多的好处。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

You can make significantly improved Techs that provide even more benefit.

Texts.Chs: 你现在可以使用更复杂的材料制造更强大的机械身体。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

You can now make even stronger mech bodies using more complex materials.

Texts.Chs: 第四层: 你是制造战斗无人机的大师。你最新的创造物比以往任何时候都更加致命，而且会很好地保护你。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

You're a master at making combat drones. Your latest creations are deadlier than ever and will protect you quite nicely.

Texts.Chs: 第4层你已经广泛地研究过蛇床子晶体，并且对它们的功能性有了很多了解。你可以建造更好的超光速驱动器和燃料净化器。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

You've studied erchius crystals extensively and know a great deal about their functionality. You can build even better FTL drives and fuel purifiers.

Texts.Chs: 你的防御模块已经变得更好，允许你抵抗更多的奇异元素，如宇宙和阴影，并完全保护热，寒冷或放射性行星。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

Your defensive modules have gotten even better, allowing you to resist more exotic elements like Cosmic and Shadow and completely protect from hot, cold or radioactive planets.

Texts.Chs: 你的技能和紧凑的电源使你可以制造两个更有用的核心，极大地扩展了你的工程能力。远程传送核心是完美的运输和建设大型，自动化项目网络，而粒子核心是无与伦比的沟道原子和亚原子粒子-光子在一个强大的激光，例如。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

Your skill with compact power sources has allowed you to make two more useful cores, expanding your engineering capability greatly. Teleporter Cores are perfect for transportation and constructing large, automated item networks, while Particle Cores are unmatched at channeling atomic and subatomic particles - the photons in a powerful laser, for example.

Texts.Chs: 由于你的机械制造天赋，周围最强壮的机械身体现在在你的能力范围之内。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5^reset;

The strongest mech bodies around are now within your ability thanks to your mech-building talent.

Texts.Chs: 第五层在你看来，如果你不能在机甲上绑上一个 BFG，然后骑着值得拥有它的人(或东西)进城，那么你就没有理由拥有一个机甲。你们最新的致命机甲武器就是完美的武器。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5^reset;

The way you see it, there's no reason to own a mech if you can't strap a BFG to it and go to town on someone (or something) that deserves it. Your newest death-dealing mech weapons are perfect for doing just that.

Texts.Chs: 通过古代精华和强大的粒子聚焦器的结合，你现在可以使用微型设备改变一个星球的一小部分来更好地满足你的欲望。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5^reset;

Through the combination of Ancient Essence and robust particle focusers, you can now alter a small part of a planet to better suit your desires using microformation devices.

Texts.Chs: 第五层随着进入 Morphite，即使是人工智能技术也是触手可及的，它可以创造出能够自我改进和基本决策的超高速计算机组件。毫不奇怪，许多政府完全禁止这项技术，因为害怕它能做出什么惊人的事情。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5^reset;

With access to Morphite, even AI technology is within your reach, allowing the creation of supremely fast computing components that are capable of self-improvement and basic decision-making. It's no surprise that many governments ban this technology outright for fear of what amazing things it can do.

Texts.Chs: 第5层随着对 EPP 模块的掌握，出现了一些新的令人惊讶的有用的创作，将提供难以置信的好处。除了改进你已经相当令人印象深刻的设计，你甚至可以抵御 Erchius 幽灵，精神错乱，纯粹的黑暗或需要吃！
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5^reset;

With mastery of EPP modules comes several new amazingly useful creations that will provide incredible benefits. In addition to improving your already considerably impressive designs, you can even ward off Erchius Ghosts, insanity, sheer darkness or the need to eat!

Texts.Chs: 你可以制造更强大的机械模块，也可以制造纳米插座，大多数顶级机械部件的成分。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5^reset;

You can make more powerful mech modules and can also craft Nano Receptacles, the ingredient in most top-tier mech parts.

Texts.Chs: 第五层你可以使用更加陌生、更加引人注目和不同寻常的微粒成像器。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5^reset;

You can use stranger, more compelling and unusual Microformers.

Texts.Chs: 你是整个银河系中最好的技术工程师之一，你的创造物几乎是该领域所有人羡慕的对象。你可以制造非常强大的技术。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5^reset;

You're one of the best tech engineers in the whole galaxy, and your creations are the envy of just about everyone in the field. You can make extremely powerful techs.

Texts.Chs: 第5层你对进步的渴望已经引导你去实验吗啡计划一个全新的，超级可怕的物质操纵器，以及一些其他的创造在一边。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5^reset;

Your desire for progress has led you to experiment with Morphite to plan a brand-new, super-awesome Matter Manipulator, as well as a few other creations on the side.

Texts.Chs: 第五层你对超光速技术的了解对任何人来说都是难以置信的，除了你。你可以制造最快的超光速驱动器和助推器，并且可以非常有效地净化和增强超光速燃料，你只需要几滴燃料就可以穿越星际间的距离。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5^reset;

Your knowledge of FTL tech is mind-boggling to anyone but you. You can make the fastest FTL drives and boosters around, and can purify and enhance FTL fuel so efficiently that you can cross the distance between stars with only a few drops of fuel.

Texts.Chs: 你的天赋创造了一些最高端的机械部件，让你以创纪录的速度奔跑、跳跃和驾驶你的机械穿越星球。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5^reset;

Your talent has produced some of the highest-end mech parts around, letting you run, jump and fly your mech through the stars at record pace.

Texts.Chs: 现在，由于你们对地球化装置的理解，甚至整个行星都可以被改变成全新的形态。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 6^reset;

Now even entire planets can be altered into entirely new forms thanks to your understanding of terraforming devices.

Texts.Chs: 事实证明，你可以做得更好，而不仅仅是吗啡。通过量子操纵器，你可以改写现实世界本身的结构，在创纪录的时间内挖掘出大量的物质。如果英格兰联邦-护国公时期还存在的话，他会嫉妒死的。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 6^reset;

Turns out you could do better than just Morphite. With a Quantum Manipulator, you can rewrite the fabric of reality itself to excavate vast amounts of material in record time. The Protectorate would be quite jealous, if it still existed.

Texts.Chs: 第六层你知道模块化机械的一切。你可以制造非常神奇的机械部件，让竞争者望尘莫及。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 6^reset;

You know everything there is to know about modular mechs. You can make extremely amazing mech parts that blow the competition away.

Texts.Chs: 你已经设计了更多的车辆，更加致命，更快，更加耐用，全方位，超级有用。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 6^reset;

You've designed a couple more vehicles that are deadlier, faster, more durable and all around, super useful.

Texts.Chs: 第六层: 你脑子里有太多的想法，除了把它们都写在纸上，没有别的事可做。你现在可以升级一些已经存在的武器到怪异和致命的新形式。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 6^reset;

You've just got so many ideas floating around in your head that there's nothing else to do but put them all onto paper. You can now upgrade several pre-existing weapons into bizarre and lethal new forms.
